channel.title: New Features & Releases on
channel.description: Recent content in New Features & Releases on

item.title: SeaMeet Release History
item.description: 08/15/2024 # New Features and Performance Optimization # Adjusted the email template for auto share. Bugfix # Fixed the incorrect timing for plan limit prompts. Resolved errors caused by the Google Meet update. Optimized performance when syncing a large number of participants. 08/08/2024 # Bugfix # Resolved the error caused by changes in Google Calendar login authentication. 08/01/2024 # New Features and Performance Optimization # Improved system infrastructure stability and performance.
